Antonio Marcos de Brito Silva

  • Endereço para acessar este CV: http://lattes.cnpq.br/7612021195469807
  • Última atualização do currículo em 30/08/2014

Graduate in Chemistry at Federal University of Paraíba - Brazil (2003), Master's degree in Materials Science at Federal University of Pernambuco - Brazil (2005), PhD (in course) in Mateials Science at Federal University of Pernambuco - (Brazil). Well experienced in bottom-up methods, metallic nanoparticles, nanoshells, magnetic nanoparticles and charachterization methods, such as Electronic Transmission Microscopy, Atomic Force Microscopy and Raman Microspectroscopy. (Texto informado pelo autor)
